title: Hello from COP27
description: Frustration and distrust among leaders are high. But, for the first time, countries have agreed to discuss funding for climate reparations.
dc:creator: Somini Sengupta
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

media:description: Of the 110 world leaders attending the COP27 climate conference, seven are women.
